abstracts.cdata!:
The Social Safety Net Sector Adjustment
            Program will support the government's Social Safety Net
            Sector Adjustment Program.  The main areas covered by the
            Program are:  (a) key social sector programs which deal with
            primary education, primary health care, disease control, and
            nutrition; and (b) the National Renewal Fund which has been
            established as a temporary social safety net to cover:  (i)
            the costs of compensation and/or severance pay, retraining
            and redeployment of workers who will be affected by the
            restructuring of sick Public Sector Enterprises (PSEs), and
            (ii) area employment regeneration schemes in cities and
            states which will be impacted by the industrial and PSE
            reform program.
